caption: Poster 2/5 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text: Trainees will have to regularly receive training at the IT Knowledge Centre. Trainees registering less than 65% biometric attendance will not be eligible to appear in the examination and will not be given a certificate. After completion of the prescribed period of training, the trainees will have to participate in the examination conducted by RKCL. Trainees will be given a certificate by RKCL on passing the examination.
